I want to use JUnit 3.8.1 to test my app written in JDK 
1.4.2...I read here in the readme that there's a problem 
with "assert" becoming a keyword in 1.4.2...I see the status of that 
is still "OPEN" in sourceforge.  Now, I would like to know from you 
experts...Is this fixed?

Regards,

Vyas
